content.question: A. Compare how the methods of sugarcane production shown in Image 1 and Image 2 differ in terms of the intensiveness of farming practices. B. Explain why the Columbian Exchange contributed to the diffusion of sugarcane from its hearth of domestication. C. Explain how the type of sugarcane production shown in Image 1 may contribute to soil erosion. D. Explain how women’s roles in society are likely to change as an area transitions from subsistence farming to commercial farming. E. Explain how patterns of world trade may affect a developing country that exports sugarcane.

unit.text: 5: Agriculture and Rural Land-Use Patterns and Processes

skill.text: Skill 2.D: Explain the significance of geographic similarities and differences among different locations and/or at different times.
